name: Filmkey Player Media File
summary: Learn about .FILM files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: FILM files are encrypted by the Filmkey encoder. The key is sent to the "filmkey.ch" server and the FILM file is uploaded to the producer server. The client downloads the FILM file from the server. To open the FILM file, Filmkey retrieves the key from the "filmkey.ch" server.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
